verses.verse: לְדָוִ֗ד <WH1732> le-da-Vid, of David מִ֫זְמ֥וֹר <WH4210> miz-Mor [A] Psalm נְאֻ֤ם <WH5002> ne-'Um said יְהוָ֨ה׀ <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD לַֽאדֹנִ֗י <WH113> la-do-Ni, unto my Lord שֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> shev Sit לִֽימִינִ֑י <WH3225> li-mi-Ni; thou at my right hand עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- Until אָשִׁ֥ית <WH7896> 'a-Shit until I make אֹ֝יְבֶ֗יךָ <WH341> 'o-ye-Vei-cha, thine enemies הֲדֹ֣ם <WH1916> ha-Dom stool לְרַגְלֶֽיךָ׃ <WH7272> le-rag-Lei-cha. your feet

מַטֵּֽה־ <WH4294> mat-teh- the rod עֻזְּךָ֗ <WH5797> 'uz-ze-Cha, of thy strength יִשְׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> yish-Lach shall send יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD מִצִּיּ֑וֹן <WH6726> mitz-tzi-Yon; out of Zion רְ֝דֵ֗ה <WH7287> re-Deh, rule בְּקֶ֣רֶב <WH7130> be-Ke-rev thou in the midst אֹיְבֶֽיךָ׃ <WH341> 'o-ye-Vei-cha. of thine enemies

עַמְּךָ֣ <WH5971> 'am-me-Cha Thy people נְדָבֹת֮ <WH5071> ne-da-Vot [shall be] willing בְּי֪וֹם <WH3117> be-Yom in the day חֵ֫ילֶ֥ךָ <WH2428> chei-Le-cha of thy power בְּֽהַדְרֵי־ <WH1926> be-had-rei- in the beauties קֹ֭דֶשׁ <WH6944> Ko-desh of holiness מֵרֶ֣חֶם <WH7358> me-Re-chem from the womb מִשְׁחָ֑ר <WH4891> mish-Char; of the morning לְ֝ךָ֗ le-cha, טַ֣ל <WH2919> tal thou hast the dew יַלְדֻתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH3208> yal-du-Tei-cha. of thy youth

נִשְׁבַּ֤ע <WH7650> nish-Ba' hath sworn יְהוָ֨ה׀ <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo and will not יִנָּחֵ֗ם <WH5162> yin-na-Chem, and will not repent אַתָּֽה־ <WH859> 'at-tah- you כֹהֵ֥ן <WH3548> cho-Hen Thou [art] a priest לְעוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam; for ever עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- According דִּ֝בְרָתִ֗י <WH1700> div-ra-Ti, after the order מַלְכִּי־ mal-ki- צֶֽדֶק׃ <WH4442> Tze-dek. of Melchizedek

אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai The Lord עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- is at יְמִֽינְךָ֑ <WH3225> ye-mi-ne-Cha; at thy right hand מָחַ֖ץ <WH4272> ma-Chatz shall strike בְּיוֹם־ <WH3117> be-yom- in the day אַפּ֣וֹ <WH639> ap-Po of his wrath מְלָכִֽים׃ <WH4428> me-la-Chim. through kings

יָדִ֣ין <WH1777> ya-Din He shall judge בַּ֭גּוֹיִם <WH1471> Bag-go-yim among the heathen מָלֵ֣א <WH4390> ma-Le he shall fill גְוִיּ֑וֹת <WH1472> ge-vi-Yot; [the places] with the dead bodies מָ֥חַץ <WH4272> Ma-chatz he shall wound רֹ֝֗אשׁ <WH7218> Rosh, the heads עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz countries רַבָּֽה׃ <WH7227> rab-Bah. over many

מִ֭נַּחַל <WH5158> Min-na-chal of the brook בַּדֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> bad-De-rech in the way יִשְׁתֶּ֑ה <WH8354> yish-Teh; He shall drink עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and כֵּ֝֗ן <WH3651> Ken, after that יָרִ֥ים <WH7311> ya-Rim therefore shall he lift up רֹֽאשׁ׃ <WH7218> Rosh. the head
